snippet: BIEGELSON--Sidney, 104. Sidney H. Biegelson was a dedicated educator for more than 40 years. Venerated by his students and those with whom he worshipped, cherished by his family and adored by his children and grandchildren, his life was characterized by integrity and humility. In recognition for his work as a champion for Jewish and humanitarian causes, he was a recipient of awards from The Forest Hills Jewish Center, UJA/Federation, The Anti-Defamation League and the Queens Lighthouse. He will be missed by those whose lives he has touched. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BIEGELSON--Sidney, 104. Sidney H. Biegelson was a dedicated educator for more than 40 years. Venerated by his students and those with whom he worshipped, cherished by his family and adored by his children and grandchildren, his life was characterized by integrity and humility. In recognition for his work as a champion for Jewish and humanitarian causes, he was a recipient of awards from The Forest Hills Jewish Center, UJA/Federation, The Anti-Defamation League and the Queens Lighthouse. He will be missed by those whose lives he has touched. 1/3
